summary.Title: Marketing Consultant, Product Marketing
summary.Presentation: Are you looking to advance your marketing career in a thriving B2B environment? We are on the hunt for a skilled Marketing Consultant to become part of our corporate marketing team, where innovatio

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you looking to advance your marketing career in a thriving B2B environment? We are on the hunt for a skilled Marketing Consultant to become part of our corporate marketing team, where innovation meets strategic planning, and teamwork is the key to success.

Role Overview:

In the role of Marketing Consultant at our headquarters in Guderup, Denmark, you will be an integral part of our Product Marketing team. Your main tasks will involve crafting marketing campaigns and product launch materials for use by our 30 international subsidiaries. You will also work closely with sales and product teams to support strategic initiatives.

Main Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement marketing campaigns for our TECHLINE segment, which focuses on electric actuator systems for industrial applications.
  • Provide expert marketing advice, developing strategies and offering guidance on best practices, market entry models, and channel selection.
  • Oversee projects and create high-quality marketing content, including English copywriting.
  • Collaborate with Product Managers and the global sales and marketing teams to bring initiatives from idea to execution.

What We Offer:

  • A collaborative work environment that emphasises teamwork and innovation.
  • Opportunities to engage in diverse projects that are both challenging and inspiring.
  • A culture that values creativity, customer focus, and adaptability.

Your Profile:

  • Demonstrated experience in B2B marketing with a strategic approach.
  • Highly organised with the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Proactive in coordinating content across various media platforms.
  • Effective in working with teams from different cultural backgrounds.
  • Proficient in English, both written and spoken.
  • Degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, International Business Communication, or a related discipline.

Why Choose Us?

At LINAK, you will experience a supportive atmosphere where professional development is encouraged, and your contributions are appreciated. We cultivate an environment where creativity is nurtured, allowing each team member to make a significant impact.

If you're ready to enhance your marketing career, we invite you to apply. For enquiries, contact Heidi Philipsen, Manager of Corporate Product Marketing, at +45 5077 1066 (available from February 3 - 2025).

Applications are reviewed continuously until the right candidate is found. Please submit your application in Danish or English.

LINAK A/S
Group Headquarters
Smedevænget 8, Guderup
6430 Nordborg
